message.content: Yes, the authors describe the limitations of their work. In the case study and limitations section (B.4), they provide examples where GPT-3 (CoT) fails to generate gold explanations, produces irrelevant explanations, or lacks coherent thought chains. Additionally, they discuss the failure cases related to image captions lacking fine-grained semantics and challenges in understanding complex and uncommon domain knowledge.

Yes, the authors describe the limitations of their work. In the Case Study and Limitations section (B.4), they provide examples where GPT-3 (CoT) fails to generate gold explanations, even when it predicts the correct answers. They discuss cases where the generated explanations are irrelevant, incorrect, or incomplete. Additionally, they present failure examples with wrong predicted answers, highlighting challenges related to image captions and questions that require understanding of complex and uncommon domain knowledge.

Yes, the authors describe the limitations of their work. In the case study and limitations section (B.4 in the appendix), they provide several examples where GPT-3 (CoT) fails to generate gold explanations or predicts wrong answers. They also highlight challenges faced by the models in understanding complex and uncommon domain knowledge and the use of image captions as inputs leading to failures in certain cases.
